::Prowl::

The beast that is Prowl turns, feeling something familiar about
Megatron, though he couldn't put his finger on it. He flaps his large
wings and gets higher up in the air, ready for a fight.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., robertdahl <rdahl@t...> wrote:
> OOC: Well since I realized that Megan's gone to bed, and I got a
> hankering to play.
> 
> BIC:
> Megatron then notices Nightstrike in trouble in the air. He decides
to
> change target. He remembered this robot Nightstrike was fighting
from
> his database. The information he stole from Condor. He lifted off
the
> ground again, and flew towards them. "PROWL" he said with vile
contempt.
> He wondered if this was the same Military Strategist that he fought
all
> those millions of years ago, or would fight in the futur.
